vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_6.sol#26-36):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_6.sol#30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reEntrancyMutex (patch_6.sol#31)
